name: loveoffootball
description: Love of Football - NFL Statistical Analytics Dashboard
author: LoveofSportsLLC johnbonnett@loveoffootball.io

scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run prod:server
scripts.uat:full: docker compose -f ./docker-compose.uat.yml down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.uat.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.uat.yml up -d && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.uat.yml logs -f
scripts.prod:full: docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml up -d && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f
scripts.clean2: echo 'Cleaning node_modules and package-lock.json' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.build:prod:client: echo 'Building client (production)' && DOCKER_ENV=false BUILD_TARGET=client NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 vite build --mode production --ssrManifest --logLevel warn
scripts.build:prod:server: echo 'Building server (production)' && DOCKER_ENV=false BUILD_TARGET=ssr NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 vite build --mode production --ssr --logLevel warn
scripts.build:prod:client:docker: echo 'Building client (production)' && DOCKER_ENV=true BUILD_TARGET=client NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 vite build --mode production --ssrManifest --logLevel warn
scripts.build:prod:server:docker: echo 'Building server (production)' && DOCKER_ENV=true BUILD_TARGET=ssr NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 vite build --mode production --ssr --logLevel warn
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prod:client && npm run build:prod:server
scripts.build:dev:client: echo 'Building client (development)' && DOCKER_ENV=false BUILD_TARGET=client vite build --mode development --outDir dist/client
scripts.build:dev:server: echo 'Building client (development)' && DOCKER_ENV=false BUILD_TARGET=ssr vite build --mode development --outDir dist/server --ssr src/entry-server.jsx
scripts.build:dev:client:docker: echo 'Building client (development)' && DOCKER_ENV=true BUILD_TARGET=client vite build --mode development --outDir dist/client
scripts.build:dev:server:docker: echo 'Building client (development)' && DOCKER_ENV=true BUILD_TARGET=ssr vite build --mode development --outDir dist/server --ssr src/entry-server.jsx
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:dev:client && npm run build:dev:server
scripts.uat:telepresence: telepresence quit && telepresence connect && telepresence intercept feuat --namespace uat --service feuat --port 3000:fehttp
